entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Kitchener-Waterloo
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 01:11 AM EST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -12.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Region of Waterloo Int'l Airport 01:54 AM EST Friday 03 February 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -12.2°C
Pressure: 101.9 kPa
Visibility: 1.2 km
Humidity: 81 %
Wind Chill: -21
Dewpoint: -14.8°C
Wind: N 24 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Thursday night: Flurries at times heavy. Low minus 20.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Flurries at times heavy beginning early this evening. Risk of snow squalls early this evening. Local blowing snow. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming northwest 30 gusting to 60 early this evening. Low minus 20. Wind chill minus 8 this evening and minus 30 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 14. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 14. Wind chill minus 30 in the morning and minus 25 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 20. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early in the evening. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light in the evening. Low minus 20. Wind chill near minus 28. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Thursday 02 February 2023
